name: cmp4
short_description: CMP is a free online Flash music player, is committed to providing the best online music player solution. Supported audio and video formats are MP3, FLV, MP4, JS interface and through the pages WMP (Windows Media Player) format playback support, such as wma. Main features list playback, MP3 visual effects (sound spectrum), synchronized lyrics (default support lrc lyrics and kmc Kara ok lyrics) (custom album list), high-definition video and live online (h264/rtmp) custom skin load a variety of plug-ins, etc., CMP4 support API calls, and allows users to achieve more custom features.
